title: Faculty Capacity-Building Program for MOOC Development and Operation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage skills and general understanding of educational planning
context.additional_context: Development and operation of MOOCs in language education, with a focus on practice-based learning in simulation/VR environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain MOOC development processes and establish stage-by-stage implementation plans
Learners can implement simulations considering learning effectiveness when designing language education content
Learners can identify potential copyright issues and propose time management strategies during MOOC operations
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
